com.ca.mas.core.security

Class KeyStoreRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ca.mas.core.security.KeyStoreRepository
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndroidJellyBeanKeyRepository, AndroidJellyBeanMR2KeyRepository, AndroidMKeyRepository

    public abstract class KeyStoreRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class to access and store keys and Certificate to the Android KeyStore.
